meanings.definition: A detailed plan for a journey or route.
meanings.sent1: She carefully crafted her itineraries for the upcoming road trip.
meanings.sent2: The travel agency provided us with itineraries for our vacation.
meanings.sent3: His overly detailed itineraries made him the unofficial trip planner of the group.
meanings.sent4: The itineraries of our lives are often filled with unexpected detours.
meanings.sent5: Memorizing the itineraries helped the students navigate the city with ease.

meanings.definition: A schedule or list of places to visit.
meanings.sent1: The museum handed out itineraries to guide visitors through the exhibits.
meanings.sent2: We followed the itineraries to explore all the famous landmarks in the city.
meanings.sent3: The dog seemed to have its own itinerary, leading us to different spots in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her itinerary of must-see restaurants was a food lover's dream come true.
meanings.sent5: The colorful brochure displayed enticing itineraries for the cruise ship passengers.
